kpi_info.title: FAIL_PDP_CONT_DEACT_SERVICES
kpi_info.use: Number of PDP context deactivation service failures. For example, when the GGSN does not answer the delete PDP context message. PDP context is removed from the SGSN, but the information that the PDP context has been deleted has not reached all the other network elements, that is, the SCP or the GGSN.
